other_title: テンリトルガルフォース (Japanese)
plot: A mock documentary of the making of Gall Force, using chibi / super-deformed versions of the characters.
ending_theme: "Sugao no Spy-tachi" (素顔のスパイたち) by Maria Kawamura, Naoko Matsui, Yuriko Yamamoto, Hiromi Tsuru, Michie Tomizawa, Eriko Hara, & Naoko Watanabe
